channel.title: The David Web (One-shot) by Hamish Cameron
channel.description:
![TheDavidWeb_cover|630x420](upload://xlqbWoRhC2sCwA6OzwphqhyBqst.jpeg)
> *Follow David.* > *Don't let him out of your sights.* > *And when the time comes, reveal yourself … and him.*
*The David Web* is a storytelling game for an unknown number of pursuers inspired by the structure and cinematography of the Jason Bourne movies.
**System:** [The David Web](https://ardensludere.itch.io/davidweb) by Hamish Cameron (No experience with the system is necessary, rules will be taught. Please see below for more information)
**Content warnings** : Possible themes include guns, violence, crime, murder, injury and death.
**Touchstones:** The Jason Bourne movies, Paul Greengrass films
**Sessions:** 1
**Duration** : 3 hrs
**Breaks** : 5-10 min breaks on the hour.
**Venue** : Zoom (a link will be sent 24 hrs prior via email).
**Recording Session** : No
**Posting Recording** : No
**Safety Tools:** Lines & Veils, X-Card and Script Change. This game will follow [the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) and the Open Door Policy is in place, meaning anyone should feel free to leave the game, or cancel as needed.
**Play aids:** *The David Web Playsheets* pdf will be provided via Google Drive. For dice roller, we'll be using [Roll With Me](https://rollwithme.xyz/).
**Communication:** A confirmation email will be sent 4 days prior in case of any changes.
